name: real_p2
formal_statement: theorem real_p2 (a b c d : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) (hd : d > 0) : a / (b + c) + b / (c + d) + c / (d + a) + d / (a + b) ≥ 2 := by

name: real_p6
formal_statement: theorem real_p6 (a b c d : ℝ) (h : a * b * c * d ≥ 1) : (a * b) * (b * c) * (c * d) * (d * a) ≥ (a + 1) * (b + 1) * (c + 1) * (d + 1) := by

name: real_p7
formal_statement: theorem real_p7 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a ≥ 0) (hb : b ≥ 0) (hc : c ≥ 0) (h : a + b + c = 3) : (a^2 - a * b + b^2) * (b^2 - b * c + c^2) * (c^2 - c * a + a^2) + 11 * a * b * c ≤ 12 := by

name: real_p10
formal_statement: theorem real_p10 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : a / b + b / c + c / a ≥ (a + c) / (b + c) + (b + a) / (c + a) + (c + b) / (a + b) := by

name: real_p12
formal_statement: theorem real_p12 (a b : ℝ) (hab : a * b > 0) : (a^4 + 4 * b^4 + 1) / (a * b) ≥ 4 := by

name: real_p16
formal_statement: theorem real_p16 (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0) (a b : Fin n → ℝ) : (∑ i : Fin n, (a i * b i)) + √((∑ i : Fin n, (a i)^2) * (∑ i : Fin n, (b i)^2)) ≥ 2 / n * (∑ i : Fin n, a i) * (∑ i : Fin n, b i) := by

name: real_p19
formal_statement: theorem real_p19 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : a / (b + c) + b / (c + a) + 2 * c / (a + b) ≥ 2 := by

name: real_p20
formal_statement: theorem real_p20 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) (hab : a ≠ b) (hbc : b ≠ c) (hca : c ≠ a) : a^2 / b + b^2 / c + c^2 / a ≥ a + b + c + 4 * (a - b)^2 / (a + b + c) := by

name: real_p22
formal_statement: theorem real_p22 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : Real.log a + Real.log b + Real.log c ≤ Real.log ((a + b) / 2) + Real.log ((b + c) / 2) + Real.log ((c + a) / 2) := by

name: real_p23
formal_statement: theorem real_p23 (a b : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hab : a > b) : √2 * a^3 + 3 / (a * b - b^2) ≥ 10 := by

name: real_p24
formal_statement: theorem real_p24 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : c / a + a / (b + c) + b / c ≥ 2 := by

name: real_p26
formal_statement: theorem real_p26 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) (h : a * b * c = 1) : a * b / (a^5 + b^5 + a * b) + b * c / (b^5 + c^5 + b * c) + c * a / (c^5 + a^5 + c * a) ≤ 1 := by

name: real_p27
formal_statement: theorem real_p27 (a b c d : ℝ) : a^6 + b^6 + c^6 + d^6 - 6 * a * b * c * d ≥ -2 := by

name: real_p29
formal_statement: theorem real_p29 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : ((a + b)^2 + (a + b + 4 * c)^2) / (a * b * c) + (a + b + c) ≥ 100 := by

name: real_p32
formal_statement: theorem real_p32 (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0) (a b c d : Fin n → ℝ) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (hb : ∀ i, b i > 0) (hc : ∀ i, c i > 0) (hd : ∀ i, d i > 0) : (∑ i : Fin n, (a i) * (b i) * (c i) * (d i))^4 ≤ (∑ i : Fin n, (a i)^4) * (∑ i : Fin n, (b i)^4) * (∑ i : Fin n, (c i)^4) * (∑ i : Fin n, (d i)^4) := by

name: real_p33
formal_statement: theorem real_p33 (n : ℕ) (k : ℝ) (a : Fin n → ℝ) (hn : n > 0) (hk : k > 0) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (h : ∑ i : Fin n, a i = k) : ∑ i : Fin n, (a i + 1 / a i)^2 ≥ n * ((n^2 + k^2) / (n * k))^2 := by

name: real_p36
formal_statement: theorem real_p36 (n : ℕ) (hn : n ≥ 2) (a : Fin n → ℝ) (ha : ∀ i, a i > 0) (h : ∑ i : Fin n, a i = 1) : ∑ i : Fin n, (a i / (2 - a i)) ≥ n / (2 * n - 1) := by

name: real_p37
formal_statement: theorem real_p37 (n : ℕ) (hn : n ≥ 2) (x : Fin n → ℝ) (hx : ∀ i, x i > 0) (h : ∑ i : Fin n, x i = 1) : ∑ i : Fin n, (x i / √(1 - x i)) ≥ 1 / √(n - 1) * ∑ i : Fin n, √(x i) := by

name: real_p42
formal_statement: theorem real_p42 (x y z : ℝ) (h : x * y + y * z + z * x = -1) : x^2 + 5 * y^2 + 8 * z^2 ≥ 4 := by

name: real_p45
formal_statement: theorem real_p45 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : a + b + c - 3 * (a * b * c) ^ (3⁻¹: ℝ) ≥ a + b - 2 * √(a * b) := by

name: real_p46
formal_statement: theorem real_p46 (x y z : ℝ) (hx : x > 0) (hy : y > 0) (hz : z > 0) (h : x + y + z = 1) : y * z + z * x + x * y - 2 * x * y * z ≤ 7 / 27 := by

name: real_p48
formal_statement: theorem real_p48 (a b : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) : (a + 1)^2 / b + (b + 3)^2 / a ≥ 16 := by

name: real_p49
formal_statement: theorem real_p49 (a b c d : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) (hd : d > 0) : 1 + 6 / (a * b + a * c + a * d + b * c + b * d + c * d) ≥ 8 / (a + b + c + d) := by
